prabhakaran awasan warata niwasaka kiya siti sthanayayi me.min pasu awasan satane awasan adiyara elambai heyin ohuta mewani sthira wasasthanayaka sewana ahimi wuna.adi 40k pamana mathupita pas aawaranayak yata polawa yatata wannata mema thun mahal aarakshitha niwahana hamu we.wishwamadu piramanthanhi pihiti mema bhugatha bankaraya thula prabhakarange nidana kamaraya saha karyala kamaraya pihita thibini.nidana kamaraye ohuge sayanaya menma awasan warata bhawitha kala yayi saka kerena gini awiyada dama gos thibuni.adi 4k pamana ganakam konkrit walin sakasa thibu bankaraya dadi wedi balayakata pawa oroththu dimata hakiyi.58 wana senankye bata piris wisin 2009 pebarawari mul sathiye mema sthanaya thama grahanayata gaththha.

shri lanka guwan sewaya kalakata ihatha lokaye hondama guwan yana sewawan 10n ekak lesa nam dara sitiyath warthamanaye siduwana kalamanakarana akra0mikatha saha dushanaya nisa eya khedaniya thaththwayakata pathwa athi bawath, samagama warshikawama salakiya yuthu alabha thaththwayakata goduru wi athi bawath, pakisthana giwisume erata athsankaru aparadha wimarshanayakata lakwa athi nisa ema giwisuma awalangu kara athi bawath abhiyachakayange parshwaye nithignyawaru penwa dunhaga illa athi thorathuru mahajana subhasiddhiyata adala karanayak se salaka nikuth karana lesa da nithignyawaru illa sitiyaha.
